title: Guidelines lock them selves in FL
content:
Anybody experienced that the guidelines lock them selves automatically in FontLab? I unlock them all the time, but the next glyph I open they are locked again. I have taken over the project from someone else, and its bugging me.

Bug or feature?

 [‹ Fontlab and compound paths](http://web.archive.org/web/20071115033805/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34104 "Go to previous forum topic") [first time creating typeFace... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071115033805/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34123 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Goran Soderstrom

comments.content:
_I have taken over the project from someone else..._

In my experience, the source of this kind of problem is often someone else’s bizarre work habits. Generate a font with what you have, open the font in FontLab, and re-save it as a .vfb file...this OUGHT to get rid of the voodoo the previous artist put into the file.
